title: 1978년 Parker 사건
summary: 미국 Pennsylvania, PA 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Parker. 판결일: 1978-11-01. 법원: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: David PARKER Et Al., Appellants-Appellees v. CHILDREN’S HOSPITAL OF PHILADELPHIA, Appellee and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania (Intervenor) Appellant; Jorge L. GARCIA Et Al., Appellants-Appellee v. KENSINGTON HOSPITAL, Appellee and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania (Intervenor) Appellant; Leonard Carl BOST, Jr., Appellant-Appellee v. PHILADELPHIA COLLEGE OF OSTEOPATHIC MEDICINE Et Al., Appellees and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania (Intervenor) Appellant
**판결일**: 1978-11-01
**법원**: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania
**관할**: Pennsylvania, PA

**판사**: Eagen, Larsen, Manderino, Nix, O'Brien, Pomeroy, Roberts

## 변호인

Robert P. Kane, Atty. Gen., Gerald Gornish, Deputy Atty. Gen., Harrisburg, for appellant at Nos. 624, 627, 628 and appellees at Nos. 709 to 714., Stephen M. Feldman, Philadelphia, for appellants at Nos. 709 & 710 and appellees at No. 628., Albert S. Fein, Philadelphia, for appellants at Nos. 711 & 712 and appellees at No. 627., Marshall A. Bernstein, Philadelphia, for appellant at Nos. 713 & 714 and appellee at No. 624., Adrian R. King, Philadelphia, for appellee at No. 624. White & Williams, Jo

## 인용

- 394 A.2d 932
- 483 Pa. 106
